name: helper
description: This task contains helper tasks, such as updating your cookbook version, which are not accommodated by the other tasks
author: Chef

inputs.name: helper
inputs.label: Helpers
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Helper to use for this task

options.envCookbookVersion: Set Cookbook Version on Chef Environment

inputs.name: cookbookVersionNumber
inputs.label: Version Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version number to apply to the metadata of the cookbook. By default this is set to the build number of the run.

inputs.name: cookbookMetadataPath
inputs.label: Cookbook Metadata File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the `metadata.rb` file for the cookbook

inputs.name: cookbookVersionRegex
inputs.label: Version Regex
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regular Expression to be used in the `metadata.rb` file to set the version number

inputs.name: habitatOrigin
inputs.label: Habitat Origin
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Habitat Origin endpoint that contains the necessary origin name, revision and keys

inputs.name: chefendpoint
inputs.label: Chef Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkdown: Select the endpoint to use when communicating with the Chef server

inputs.name: azureendpoint
inputs.label: Azure RM Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkdown: Endpoint containing credentials to communicate with Azure to perform Test Kitchen tests

inputs.name: environmentName
inputs.label: Chef environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Chef environment to modify

inputs.name: envFilePath
inputs.label: Environment File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the file containing variables that should be set as environment variables
